name: Conquerer

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally ATK in all Battles by 18%.

skills.name: Swift Blow
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Cut Down To Size
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Removes 2 random buffs from the target.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Purge
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Enemies killed by this skill cannot be revived.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%
Lvl. 6 Damage +10%
Lvl. 7 Cooldown -1
